scenario.name: sip2sip
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:svyaznoy.ru SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];alias;branch=[branch];rport From: <sip:[field2]@svyaznoy.ru>;tag=[call_number] To: sip:[field0] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Call-ID: [call_id] Max-Forwards: 70 Supported: replaces, outbound Contact: <sip:[field2]@46.29.8.78:38146;transport=tcp> Expires: 3600 User-Agent: TestAgent/1 Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:svyaznoy.ru SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];alias;branch=[branch];rport From: <sip:[field2]@svyaznoy.ru>;tag=[call_number] To: sip:[field0] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Call-ID: [call_id] Max-Forwards: 70 Supported: replaces, outbound Contact: <sip:[field2]@46.29.8.78:38146;transport=tcp> [field1] Expires: 3600 User-Agent: TestAgent/1 Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[field3] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport From: <sip:[field0]>;tag=[call_number] To: sip:[field3] CSeq: 2 INVITE Call-ID: [call_id] Supported: replaces, outbound Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] Contact: <sip:[field2]@46.29.8.78:38146;transport=tcp> User-Agent: SPhone/1 (belle-sip/1.3.1)
v=0 o=[field2] 1160 3466 IN IP4 10.0.2.15 s=Talk c=IN IP4 10.0.2.15 b=AS:380 t=0 0 m=audio 7076 RTP/AVP 120 111 110 0 8 101 a=rtpmap:120 SILK/16000 a=rtpmap:111 speex/16000 a=fmtp:111 vbr=on a=rtpmap:110 speex/8000 a=fmtp:110 vbr=on a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15

ACK sip:[field3] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport Call-ID: [call_id] From: <sip:[field0]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]>;[peer_tag_param] Contact: <sip:[field2]@46.29.8.78:38146;transport=tcp> Max-Forwards: 70 CSeq: 20 ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[field3] SIP/2.0 CSeq: 3 INVITE Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport User-Agent: TestAgent/0.0.1 From: <sip:[field0]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] Supported: replaces, outbound To: sip:[field3] Contact: <sip:[field2]@46.29.8.78:38146;transport=tcp> [field1] Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,BYE,CANCEL,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,REFER,MESSAGE,INFO,PING,PRACK Content-Length: [len] Content-Type: application/sdp Max-Forwards: 70
v=0 o=[field3] 1160 3466 IN IP4 10.0.2.15 s=Talk c=IN IP4 10.0.2.15 b=AS:380 t=0 0 m=audio 7076 RTP/AVP 120 111 110 0 8 101 a=rtpmap:120 SILK/16000 a=rtpmap:111 speex/16000 a=fmtp:111 vbr=on a=rtpmap:110 speex/8000 a=fmtp:110 vbr=on a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15
BYE sip:[field3] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq+1] BYE [last_Contact:] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
